title: Mafia Typefaces
content:
Im looking for mafia typeface suggestions, something that is similar to New Deal by Neville Brody.

Can anyone think of something?

[http://www.aisleone.net/2009/typography/new-deal-typeface-by-neville-brody/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090130/http:/www.aisleone.net/2009/typography/new-deal-typeface-by-neville-brody/ "http://www.aisleone.net/2009/typography/new-deal-typeface-by-neville-brody/")

Thanks in advance!
author: typevolcom

comments.content:
I'm not sure New Deal has anything to do with the mafia, per se. It's more about 1930s America (of which the mafia was a part). So there are lots of ways you could go with this.

But if you're interested in something similar, have a look at [WPA Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090130/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/14740) and let me know if you want to use it commercially.
